xyz.fsgik.common.net.tcp

Interface FsTcpClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FsTcpEndpoint

    @ThreadSafe
public interface FsTcpClient
extends FsTcpEndpoint
    TCP/IP client interface, client endpoint of FsTcpEndpoint.

    A FsTcpClient implementation should support following types of handler:

    • one FsTcpClientHandler: to deal with client actions;
    • a list of FsTcpClientHandler: to deal with actions for the connection;

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  FsTcpClient.Builder
      Builder for FsTcpClient, based on Socket.

    • Method Detail

      • newBuilder

        static FsTcpClient.Builder newBuilder()
        Returns new builder of FsTcpClient. The returned builder is based on Socket.
        Returns:
        new builder

      • start

        default void start(java.net.SocketAddress address)
        Starts this client and blocks until the client has been closed. Connection timeout is 30 seconds.
        Parameters:
        address - address of target endpoint

      • start

        default void start(java.lang.String host,
                   int port)
        Starts this client and blocks until the client has been closed. Connection timeout is 30 seconds.
        Parameters:
        host - host name of target endpoint
        port - port of target endpoint

      • start

        void start(java.net.SocketAddress address,
           @Nullable
           @Nullable java.time.Duration timeout)
        Starts this client and blocks until the client has been closed.
        Parameters:
        address - address of target endpoint
        timeout - wait timeout to connect, maybe null to infinite waiting

      • toBuilder

        FsTcpClient.Builder toBuilder()
        Returns a new builder configured with this client.
        Returns:
        a new builder configured with this client
